```{r, include=FALSE}
install.packages(c("readxl", "dplyr", "ggplot2", "gridExtra"))
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)

data <- read_excel("Sampledata2.xlsx")
average_crimerate <- data %>% group_by(Year) %>% summarise(avg_Crimerate = mean(CrimeRate))
head(data)
histogram_plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = CrimeRate, fill = as.factor(Year))) + geom_histogram(position = "dodge", alpha = 0.7, bins = 30) + labs(title = "Grouped Histogram of CrimeRate", x = "CrimeRate", y = "Frequency") + theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "right")
scatter <- ggplot(average_crimerate, aes(x = Year, y = avg_Crimerate)) + geom_point() + geom_line(aes(group = 1, y = avg_Crimerate), color = "blue") labs(title = "Scatter Plot of Year vs. Average Crimerate with Trend Line", x = "Year", y = "Average Crimerate") + theme_minimal()
box_plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = as.factor(Year), y = CrimeRate, fill = as.factor(Year))) + geom_boxplot() + labs(title = "Grouped Box Plot of Crimerate by Year", x = "Year", y = "Crimerate") + theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "none")
```

# Multiple-view layout

## Create plots

* A histogram plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
print(histogram_plot)
```

* A scatter plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
print(scatter)
```

* A box plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}
print(box_plot)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
grid_arrange <- grid.arrange(histogram_plot, scatter, box_plot, ncol = 3)
print(grid_arrange)
```
